name: Bear With Me (itch) (Zoey Tang, Kevin Long)
name_original: Bear With Me (itch) (Zoey Tang, Kevin Long)
description:
Bear With Me... ...is a puzzle platformer set in a unique two-sided universe. ~~~ (ᵔᴥᵔ) ~~~

- Use AD/Arrow keys to move and space to jump

- Press R anytime to restart from the last checkpoint

 - Play as two mirrored bears navigating the parallel world!

 - Assist one another in puzzle solving but avoid burdening each other with your clumsy movements.

~~~ (ᵔᴥᵔ) ~~~ "Entangled in an inseparable relationship, the two bears have no choice but to proceed together. Bear with me on this unpredictable adventure." ~~~ (ᵔᴥᵔ) ~~~ Curated by Kevin Long & Zoey Tang <3
